articles.content: MUMBI : Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd, controlled by Canadian billionaire Prem Watsa, plans to sell its entire stake in Bangalore International Airport Ltd (BIAL) for at least $1.5 billion, two peop… [+5596 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: USFDA issues import alert on Glenmark Pharma's Baddi plant - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The drugs produced at the Baddi unit can now be detained without physical examination.
articles.content:
Glenmark Pharmaceuticals on Wednesday said the US health regulator has put its manufacturing plant at Baddi under import alert.
The drugs produced at the Baddi unit can now be detained without physi… [+1024 chars]
